text:
Started my internship at a tech startup today! 🚀
Nervous but excited to apply everything I learned in college.
Time to turn theory into practice! 💻
#InternshipLife #TechStartup #LearningJourney

Failed my first technical interview today 😔
But you know what? I learned more in that 1 hour than I did in weeks of preparation.
Every failure is a stepping stone to success! 💪
#InterviewExperience #Growth #NeverGiveUp

College mein professor ne kaha tha:
'Coding sikhna easy hai, problem solving difficult hai'
Aaj samjha ki kitni sachi baat thi! 🤯
#CollegeLessons #ProblemSolving #RealityCheck

10 Tips for New Computer Science Students:
1. Practice coding daily
2. Build projects, not just assignments
3. Contribute to open source
4. Network with seniors
5. Attend tech meetups
6. Learn git and version control
7. Understand data structures deeply
8. Don't just memorize, understand concepts
9. Work on communication skills
10. Stay curious and keep learning!
#CSStudents #TechTips #StudentLife

Mental health during job search is so important but nobody talks about it 🧠
Rejections hurt, ghosting hurts more.
But remember: your worth is not defined by a job offer.
Take breaks, talk to friends, and keep pushing forward! ❤️
#MentalHealthAwareness #JobSearch #YouAreWorthy

Built my first React app today! 🎉
It's just a simple todo list but I feel like I conquered the world 🌍
Small wins count too! 💪
#ReactJS #FirstProject #WebDevelopment #SmallWins

Career advice nobody gives you:
Your first job won't be perfect.
Your dream company might reject you.
You'll work with difficult people.
You'll make mistakes.
And that's all OKAY! 🌟
Every experience teaches you something. Embrace the journey! 🚀
#CareerAdvice #RealTalk #GrowthMindset

Debugging at 2 AM hits different 🌙
When you finally find that missing semicolon after 3 hours... 😅
The relief is unmatched! Anyone else been there?
#DebuggingLife #LateNightCoding #ProgrammerStruggles
